blogPost.excerpt: OneBar is a shared Q&A knowledge base for your team. With our new Chrome Extension, you can access OneBar answers in any web app you use. Improve your sales responses in Gmail, speed up case resolution in Intercom, or even optimize prospecting on LinkedIn.
blogPost.body: OneBar is a shared Q&A knowledge base for your team. With our new Chrome Extension, you can access OneBar answers in any web app you use. Improve your sales responses in Gmail, speed up case resolution in Intercom, or even optimize prospecting on LinkedIn.
blogPost.title: OneBar for Chrome - Q&A knowledge base built into every app you use
blogPost.author: Maxim Leonovich

localize.description: OneBar是您团队的共享问答知识库。通过我们新的Chrome扩展，您可以在您使用的任何网络应用中访问OneBar答案。改进您在Gmail中的销售响应，加快Intercom中的案例解决，甚至优化LinkedIn上的潜在客户。
localize.tagline: 您使用的每个应用程序都内置了问答知识库

localize.description: OneBar是您團隊的共享問答知識庫。通過我們新的Chrome擴展，您可以在您使用的任何網絡應用中訪問OneBar答案。改進您在Gmail中的銷售響應，加快Intercom中的案例解決，甚至優化LinkedIn上的潛在客戶。
localize.tagline: 您使用的每個應用程序都內置了問答知識庫

previous.title:
I think the thing I'm most thankful for about being born in the early-1980s is we didn't have social media or cell phone cameras when I was in college

We also didn't really have Wikipedia to write papers but that seems like a fair trade to me

localize.full_text:
我想，我最庆幸自己出生在80年代初的事情，就是在我上大学的时候，我们还没有社交媒体，也没有手机摄像头。

我们也没有真正的维基百科来写论文，但这在我看来是一个公平的交易。

我想，我最慶幸自己出生在80年代初的事情，就是在我上大學的時候，我們還沒有社交媒體，也沒有手機攝像頭。

我們也沒有真正的維基百科來寫論文，但這在我看來是一個公平的交易。

next.excerpt: Eqtble unlocks the value of your HR data by answering why top performers are leaving and why qualified candidates are declining offers. Built by connecting with 150+ systems, we deliver insights on Workforce, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, and Compensation.
next.title: eqtble - Making it easy for companies to gain insights from HR data

localize.description: Eqtble通过回答为什么表现优异的员工会离开，为什么合格的候选人会拒绝聘用，来释放您的人力资源数据的价值。通过与150多个系统的连接，我们提供关于劳动力、人才招聘、参与和薪酬的见解。
localize.tagline: 让企业轻松从人力资源数据中获得洞察力。

localize.description: Eqtble通過回答爲什麼表現優異的員工會離開，爲什麼合格的候選人會拒絕聘用，來釋放您的人力資源數據的價值。通過與150多個系統的連接，我們提供關於勞動力、人才招聘、參與和薪酬的見解。
localize.tagline: 讓企業輕鬆從人力資源數據中獲得洞察力。
